name: Bounce! - The World's Most Accurate Cooking Sim
name_original: Bounce! - The World's Most Accurate Cooking Sim
description:
Bounce! is a new generation of cooking sim, advanced in every way. Bounce! is a perfect reflection of reality, where chefs must work in bouncy castles with dangerous bombs and food items flying all around for maximum efficiency in assembling customers' combo orders! Bounce! - it's the world's most accurate cooking sim.
Made in 48 hours for DJAM #7.

~ ~ ~

Controls:
Left Click - Interact, Grab, Throw
WASD - Move, Jump
Escape - Return to Title Screen
